metadata.synopsis: Vlaakith appears through the planecaster. Vlaakith explains that there's a prisoner inside who needs to be killed for the safety of the gith and activates he planecaster so it can be used to open the artefact.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to 1357; 0; -785 in CRE_Main_A. Enter the captain's office, and go thorugh the dialogs as you want. Go to the Security office.Go through the Inquisitor dialog and show the artefact, or kill the inquisitor. This dialog automatically triggers afterwards.

111.speaker: Vlaakith
111.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of player reacting to hearing a disembodied voice. NodeContext: Vlaakith should sligjhtly overpronounce every word, think Davros from Doctor Who, each syllable drips with a kind of mad, ancient evil

32.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The planecaster vibrates, shaking the ground around it. 
Flares of light curl up in its centre and grow to full form. 
Vlaakith appears, awesome and terrible, at least twice the size of any human, a hologram in a haze of astral flares.

147.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Inquisitor kneels before Vlaakith's image, surprised to see her. All of his staff kneel also. NodeContext: pronounced VLAH-kith gawg shkaath ZAI (meaning 'For the honour of Vlaakith!')

6.speaker: Ch'r'ai W'wargaz
6.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Inquisitor kneels before Vlaakith's image, surprised to see her. All of his staff kneel also. NodeContext: pronounced VLAH-kith gawg shkaath ZAI (meaning 'For the honour of Vlaakith!')

31.speaker: Player
31.text: *Your vision thrums green and gold for a moment as your patron borrows your eye to see the vision before you.*
31.context: NodeContext: her facade splinters a little, letting her mad, immortal rage take over

109.speaker: Narrator
109.text: *Your vision throbs with ink-black darkness as your patron borrows your gaze - beholding the vision in front of you.*
109.context: NodeContext: her facade splinters a little, letting her mad, immortal rage take over

20.speaker: Narrator
20.text: *Not exactly a god - but not far off. Your patron recoils, but not before leaving a word of advice - caution.*

114.speaker: Narrator
114.text: *The queen who brings conquest to the heavens, sundering planets, destroying the very stars.*
114.context: NodeContext: her facade splinters a little, letting her mad, immortal rage take over

10.speaker: Narrator
10.text: *Hot envy swirls within. Your guts will you to author such cosmic tragedies as she has.*
10.context: NodeContext: her facade splinters a little, letting her mad, immortal rage take over

58.speaker: Vlaakith
58.text: You are permitted to look upon me. You are invited to kneel.
58.context: NodeContext: her facade splinters a little, letting her mad, immortal rage take over

141.speaker: Player
141.context: NodeContext: her facade splinters a little, letting her mad, immortal rage take over

13.speaker: Vlaakith
13.context: NodeContext: her facade splinters a little, letting her mad, immortal rage take over

43.speaker: Vlaakith
43.text: I am Vlaakith. Undying Queen of the noble githyanki. God Regent of the Six Arms of Tu'narath.
43.context: NodeContext: anger should build rhythmically here, each consonant semi-spat in rage

131.speaker: Vlaakith
131.context: CinematicNodeContext: vlaakith bellows this in the face of the player, before stopping herself, and recovering her composure slightlyNodeContext: she loses her shit here, before collecting herself

66.speaker: Player
66.text: Stay standing, just as you are.
66.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Inquisitor frowns at your insolence.

29.text: Did your crèche teach you nothing?
29.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Inquisitor frowns at your insolence.

76.speaker: Ch'r'ai W'wargaz
76.text: Did your crèche teach you nothing?
76.context: InternalNodeContext: The Inquisitor hisses at the player while kneeling.

137.text: You bear that which is ours. But are you friend, or are you thief?
137.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith, unfazed in the least, considers you with critical interest.

110.text: You bear that which is ours. But are you friend, or are you thief?
110.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith looms in to face the player at their eye level.

128.text: You bear that which is ours. But are you friend, or are you thief?
128.context: NodeContext: Response to "I'm giving the artefact to Vlaakith"

123.speaker: Vlaakith
123.text: You bear that which is ours. But are you friend, or are you thief?
123.context: NodeContext: Response to "I'm giving the artefact to Vlaakith"

142.speaker: Player
142.text: I didn't steal it, it just... found me.
142.context: NodeContext: Response to "I'm giving the artefact to Vlaakith"

5.speaker: Player
5.text: I didn't steal it, it just... found me.
5.context: NodeContext: Response to "I'm giving the artefact to Vlaakith"

44.speaker: Player
44.text: Friend - I came to bring it back to you.
44.context: NodeContext: Response to "I'm giving the artefact to Vlaakith"

28.speaker: Narrator
28.text: You're what? That is the only thing keeping us from a gruesome, tentacled-filled future.
28.context: NodeContext: Response to "I'm giving the artefact to Vlaakith"

127.speaker: Astarion
127.text: You're what? That is the only thing keeping us from a gruesome, tentacled-filled future.
127.context: NodeContext: Response to "I'm giving the artefact to Vlaakith"

62.speaker: Wyll
62.text: Are you mad? That artefact's the only thing shielding us from the Absolute's voice.
62.context: NodeContext: Angry. Player is trying to give their lifeline and the object of her mission away.

60.speaker: Lae'zel
60.text: Vlaakith has spoken. You have listened. This is the way.
60.context: NodeContext: Angry. Player is trying to give their lifeline and the object of her mission away.

85.speaker: Shadowheart
85.text: Fool - that artefact is the only thing keeping us safe. She cannot have it.
85.context: NodeContext: Angry. Player is trying to give their lifeline and the object of her mission away.

47.speaker: Karlach
47.text: Hey - wait! That's the only thing keeping us from transforming!
47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith returns to her full posture.

75.speaker: Narrator
75.text: An unexpected servant. Your will is strong.
75.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith returns to her full posture.

21.speaker: Vlaakith
21.text: An unexpected servant. Your will is strong.
21.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith returns to her full posture.

52.speaker: Vlaakith
52.text: Your kind's stoic endurance will be a boon to our cause.
52.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith returns to her full posture.

12.speaker: Vlaakith
12.text: Your kind's heritage is long and storied. It is an honour to be served by one so noble.
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith returns to her full posture.

42.speaker: Vlaakith
42.text: Your kind is not known for trusting strangers. Quite rightly. Yet here you are.
42.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith returns to her full posture.

69.speaker: Vlaakith
69.text: You have ventured far from your kind's comforts to serve us.
69.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith returns to her full posture.

3.speaker: Vlaakith
3.text: Descendant of noble dragons - you honour us with your allyship.
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith returns to her full posture.

140.speaker: Vlaakith
140.text: Extend your fealty one step further, and you will be rewarded beyond your mortal reckoning.
140.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith returns to her full posture.

132.speaker: Vlaakith
132.text: Your kind will go far for glory. As you have shown by being here.

25.speaker: Vlaakith
25.text: My child. You walk on the path of ascension.

92.speaker: Gale
92.text: How generous of you - but perhaps you've forgotten we need it ourselves? That thing is keeping us safe.

73.speaker: Player
73.text: Neither - I came here looking for a cure for my tadpole.
73.context: CinematicNodeContext: A visual flare as she experiences intense emotion. NodeContext: completely incredulous

102.speaker: Vlaakith
102.text: And you just happened to STUMBLE on the Astral Prism?
102.context: CinematicNodeContext: A visual flare as she experiences intense emotion. NodeContext: completely incredulous

100.speaker: Vlaakith
100.context: CinematicNodeContext: A long pause. Player waits awkwardly for Vlaakith to say something. NodeContext: Scary and torn while she considers you

41.speaker: Vlaakith
41.text: At least you brought it back. It is a start.
41.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith returns to her full posture.

80.speaker: Vlaakith
80.text: We will test you. To assess whether you deserve reward or punishment.
80.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith returns to her full posture.

63.text: The Astral Prism - it is corrupted.
63.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith summons a floating hologram of the artefact and psionically spins it, toying with it.

87.speaker: Vlaakith
87.text: The Astral Prism - it is corrupted.
87.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith summons a floating hologram of the artefact and psionically spins it, toying with it.

77.speaker: Ch'r'ai W'wargaz
77.text: I shall cleanse it for you, my queen. Tell me how.
77.context: CinematicNodeContext: W'wargaz stands, appealing to his queen, desperate to be given this twisted honourInternalNodeContext: He's not altogether sure why this task is falling to the player and not to him, but also doesn't want to challenge his queen's motivations.

72.speaker: Vlaakith
72.context: CinematicNodeContext: After he is rebuked, W'wargaz stands sulkily behind the player

36.text: There is someone inside. Their mind is warped, broken - a blight.
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a close of her fist, the artefact hologram is shattered in mid-air in a burst of astral flare.

125.speaker: Vlaakith
125.text: There is someone inside. Their mind is warped, broken - a blight.
125.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a close of her fist, the artefact hologram is shattered in mid-air in a burst of astral flare.

90.speaker: Vlaakith
90.text: They are an agent of the Grand Design. Sent to sabotage the Astral Prism - our last defence against the return of the Illithid Empire.
90.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a close of her fist, the artefact hologram is shattered in mid-air in a burst of astral flare.

27.speaker: Vlaakith
27.text: As long as they live, the Prism is compromised.
27.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a close of her fist, the artefact hologram is shattered in mid-air in a burst of astral flare.

113.speaker: Vlaakith
113.text: Find the one inside and destroy them. Be aware - they are not alone, and they will appeal to your trust. They are not to be believed.
113.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a close of her fist, the artefact hologram is shattered in mid-air in a burst of astral flare.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: My skills and fate are not subject to your whims.
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: The room rumbles, the gith (and inquisitor) in here look terrifiedNodeContext: she loses herself a bit in rage here,

78.speaker: Player
78.text: So the dream visitor is inside the artefact... I can't kill them. They protect me from the Absolute.
78.context: CinematicNodeContext: The room rumbles, the gith (and inquisitor) in here look terrifiedNodeContext: she loses herself a bit in rage here,

117.speaker: Vlaakith
117.context: CinematicNodeContext: The room rumbles, the gith (and inquisitor) in here look terrifiedNodeContext: she loses herself a bit in rage here,

17.speaker: Vlaakith
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: The room rumbles, the gith (and inquisitor) in here look terrifiedNodeContext: she loses herself a bit in rage here,

144.speaker: Player
144.text: Fine. I will go in and kill them.
144.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith looks the player over, and gives a ghastly, frightening smile.

34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith looks the player over, and gives a ghastly, frightening smile.

45.speaker: Player
45.text: No. In fact, maybe I'll free the one inside.
45.context: NodeContext: leering - you won't be allowed to get away with this

9.speaker: Vlaakith
9.context: NodeContext: leering - you won't be allowed to get away with this

104.speaker: Vlaakith
104.text: Use this to enter the Prism, or deny me. The choice is yours.
104.context: InternalNodeContext: follow up with act 3 consequence during gith invasion

8.speaker: Vlaakith
8.text: But know this: my wrath is carried with each of my faithful. It will find you.

46.speaker: Vlaakith
46.context: CinematicNodeContext: The image of Vlaakith flickers away within the planecaster, replaced by an image of the artefact suspended above the device.

4.speaker: Vlaakith
4.text: W'wargaz - kill it. Enter the Prism yourself. See that protocol is done.
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: The image of Vlaakith flickers away within the planecaster, replaced by an image of the artefact suspended above the device.

7.speaker: Player
7.text: If you're a god, do it yourself.

135.speaker: Player
135.text: My oath is sworn to the ancient magic of this world - not your astral empire. I owe you nothing.

81.speaker: Player
81.text: It is my greatest honour to obey.
81.context: NodeContext: again, she's close to losing it a bit here, "would you" said with max venom

82.speaker: Player
82.text: I will do as you wish.
82.context: NodeContext: again, she's close to losing it a bit here, "would you" said with max venom

88.speaker: Player
88.text: The god-queen of my people cannot kill someone herself?
88.context: NodeContext: again, she's close to losing it a bit here, "would you" said with max venom

48.speaker: Vlaakith
48.text: Perhaps I misheard. You would not speak ill of a god. Would you?
48.context: NodeContext: again, she's close to losing it a bit here, "would you" said with max venom

106.speaker: Player
106.text: I spoke too hastily - please forgive me.
106.context: CinematicNodeContext: The image of Vlaakith flickers away within the planecaster, replaced by an image of the artefact suspended above the device.

83.speaker: Vlaakith
83.context: CinematicNodeContext: The image of Vlaakith flickers away within the planecaster, replaced by an image of the artefact suspended above the device.

30.text: Use the planecaster's power to enter the Prism.
30.context: CinematicNodeContext: The image of Vlaakith flickers away within the planecaster, replaced by an image of the artefact suspended above the device.

98.text: Use the planecaster's power to enter the Prism.
98.context: NodeContext: gith variant said with gritted teeth, non gith variant said almost muttered to self

14.speaker: Vlaakith
14.text: Use the planecaster's power to enter the Prism.
14.context: NodeContext: gith variant said with gritted teeth, non gith variant said almost muttered to self

35.speaker: Ch'r'ai W'wargaz
35.text: An istik... A crusader for my queen... Unimaginable. You are blessed, istik. Do not fail her!
35.context: NodeContext: gith variant said with gritted teeth, non gith variant said almost muttered to self

119.speaker: Vlaakith
119.text: Be wary of the creature's lying tongue. Cut it out, if you must.

130.speaker: Player
130.text: I just think a real god could kill whoever she wants.
130.context: CinematicNodeContext: at the word "wish", Vlaakith invokes the most powerful, reality-bending magic of the multiverse. The Wish. her image shakes, as does the room around the players. we cut to gameplay, and they die .

138.speaker: Vlaakith
138.context: CinematicNodeContext: at the word "wish", Vlaakith invokes the most powerful, reality-bending magic of the multiverse. The Wish. her image shakes, as does the room around the players. we cut to gameplay, and they die .

97.speaker: Vlaakith
97.context: CinematicNodeContext: at the word "wish", Vlaakith invokes the most powerful, reality-bending magic of the multiverse. The Wish. her image shakes, as does the room around the players. we cut to gameplay, and they die .

59.speaker: Vlaakith
59.context: CinematicNodeContext: at the word "wish", Vlaakith invokes the most powerful, reality-bending magic of the multiverse. The Wish. her image shakes, as does the room around the players. we cut to gameplay, and they die .

33.speaker: Vlaakith
33.text: Find the one inside and kill them. Be aware - they are not alone, and they will appeal to your trust. They are not to be believed.
33.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a close of her fist, the artefact hologram is shattered in mid-air in a burst of astral flare.

118.speaker: Vlaakith
118.text: You must accept. Refuse, and know my fury.
118.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player reads Vlaakith's thoughts with difficulty.

105.speaker: Player
105.text: Can't you kill the one inside yourself? I thought 'gods' were all-powerful.
105.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player reads Vlaakith's thoughts with difficulty.

145.speaker: Player
145.text: No way. I don't work for deluded tyrants.
145.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player reads Vlaakith's thoughts with difficulty.

19.speaker: Player
19.text: Try to peer into your queen's mind.
19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player reads Vlaakith's thoughts with difficulty.

86.speaker: Vlaakith
86.text: *Behind the veil of the god-queen's outer thoughts - death. Fear. Paranoia.*
86.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player reads Vlaakith's thoughts with difficulty.

64.speaker: Narrator
64.text: *Behind the veil of the god-queen's outer thoughts - death. Fear. Paranoia.*
64.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player reads Vlaakith's thoughts with difficulty.

108.speaker: Narrator
108.text: *She fears the one inside the artefact more than anything in the world. But she's hiding something.*
108.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player recovers from reading Vlaakith's thoughts.

103.speaker: Narrator
103.text: *The veil snaps back. Vlaakith's mind shut out to you forever.*
103.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player recovers from reading Vlaakith's thoughts.

116.speaker: Player
116.text: Does it matter? I brought it back to you.

136.speaker: Vlaakith
136.text: That is no answer to my question.

115.speaker: Player
115.text: Yours? I found it. The artefact is mine.

95.speaker: Vlaakith
95.text: Surely there's a more tactful way to say that? One that won't get us killed?

61.speaker: Astarion
61.text: Surely there's a more tactful way to say that? One that won't get us killed?

16.speaker: Wyll
16.text: By the Nine Hells - she's not going to like that.

94.speaker: Vlaakith
94.text: To own something is to know it. You know NOTHING of what you carry.

91.speaker: Vlaakith
91.text: To own something is to know it. You know NOTHING of what you carry.

133.speaker: Lae'zel
133.text: Fool. You speak with the Lich Queen. You do not refuse Vlaakith.

129.speaker: Shadowheart
129.text: Good. Whatever happens to us, the lich queen must not take the artefact.

126.speaker: Karlach
126.text: Gods, she's gonna rip our legs off.

18.speaker: Gale
18.text: I don't think she's the type who hears 'no' very often...

79.speaker: Player
79.text: I am more than friend. I am your most loyal servant.
79.context: NodeContext: Outraged. The player just ratted her out.

23.speaker: Player
23.text: I didn't steal anything, but Shadowheart here...
23.context: NodeContext: Outraged. The player just ratted her out.

146.speaker: Shadowheart
146.context: NodeContext: Outraged. The player just ratted her out.

74.speaker: Shadowheart
74.text: That's it. We're dead, thanks to you.
74.context: NodeContext: Outraged. The player just ratted her out.

107.speaker: Ch'r'ai W'wargaz
107.text: I expected little of istik education, but here we kneel before our queen.

84.speaker: Player
84.text: Kneel: choke down your brutal pride.
84.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player waves politely at Vlaakith.

40.speaker: Player
40.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player waves politely at Vlaakith.

89.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player waves politely at Vlaakith.

101.speaker: Player
101.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player kneels, head bowed, solemn, appropriate. Vlaakith offers something resembling a smile, and gestures for the player to rise. The player rises.

39.speaker: Player
39.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player kneels, head bowed, solemn, appropriate. Vlaakith offers something resembling a smile, and gestures for the player to rise. The player rises.

134.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player kneels, head bowed, solemn, appropriate. Vlaakith offers something resembling a smile, and gestures for the player to rise. The player rises.

120.speaker: Vlaakith
120.text: Inquisitor W'wargaz was potent. We are impressed.
120.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of player reacting to hearing a disembodied voice.NodeContext: Vlaakith should sligjhtly overpronounce every word, think Davros from Doctor Who, each syllable drips with a kind of mad, ancient evil
